(negative prefix)/not/no
part/share/ingredient/component

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

sentences.english: It was tight. so ti lasted a long time .
sentences.chinese: 两队不分胜负，所以持续了很长一段时间。

sentences.english: The two teams tied(with each other).
The most likely result is a draw.
sentences.chinese: 最可能的结果是不分胜负。

sentences.english: Based on that, you'd think it'd be a dead-heat coming into this season.
sentences.chinese: 根据这个比较，你会认为他们不分胜负进入新赛季。
那是一场不分胜负的战争。

sentences.english: The boys played a drawn game of chess.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们下了一盘国际象棋，不分胜负。

sentences.english: We've had several drawn matches this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年我们有几次比赛不分胜负。

sentences.english: The match ended in a draw.
sentences.chinese: 那场比赛最后不分胜负。
